trans-unit.resname: PULG·122 | Beast of Burden | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Beast of Burden has power and toughness each equal to the total number of creatures in play.

trans-unit.resname: PULG·122 | Beast of Burden | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "If it is meant to be nothing but a machine," Karn finally asked Jhoira, "why did Urza build it to be like me?"

trans-unit.resname: PULG·122† | Beast of Burden | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Beast of Burden's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures on the battlefield.

trans-unit.resname: PULG·122† | Beast of Burden | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "If it is meant to be nothing but a machine," Karn finally asked Jhoira, "why did Urza build it to be like me?"
